newsitem.title: JAPAN: MOF says to hold 10-year JGB auction on Tuesday.
newsitem.headline: MOF says to hold 10-year JGB auction on Tuesday.

text.p: The Ministry of Finance (MOF) is planning to offer 10-year Japanese government bonds through a price-competitive auction on Tuesday, a ministry official said on Monday.
Traders said the coupon rate for the new 10-year JGB issue was likely to be set at a new all-time low of 2.3 percent.
The ministry offered one trillion yen worth of 10-year JGBs with a record-low coupon rate of 2.5 percent at its previous 10-year JGB auction held in March.
